QuestData.Title: The Windrunner Fleet
QuestData.Description: We have the Windrunner, the Queen's Reprisal and the Oblivion stationed just east of the Derelict Strand. Send orders to the fleet's commander, Captain Harker, that they're to destroy the Alliance's cannons.$B$BSpeak to our bat handler, Camille, and ask for passage to the fleet's location. Be quick, $n, every minute we spend fighting the Alliance is a minute we could've spent fighting Arthas.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Bat Handler Camille at Vengeance Landing and obtain passage to the Windrunner. Report to Captain Harker aboard the ship.
QuestData.RewardText: I hope you're ready to fight, $n. The Queen's fleet needs you!
